p: Meanwhile, cytotoxic effects on macrophages from mice were determined and used to calculate the selectivity index (SI). The EO showed low SI values in general, except in the case of T. cruzi. It is known that one of most important criteria to select “hits” during in vitro screening is to demonstrate a SI superior to 10 [ 26], which was only accomplished by the T. cruzi parasite (SI = 13).
